snippet.title: Peridot Official Teaser | Niantic
snippet.description:
We're excited to share our newest AR-first mobile game built on the premise of raising and caring for adorable virtual creatures. Meet Peridot.

Pre-register: www.playperidot.com

Subscribe to our channel - https://bit.ly/3j4tQWD

Watch our most POPULAR Videos - https://bit.ly/3kLjN9D

Niantic Labs on SOCIAL
Follow us on Instagram: instagram.com/nianticlabs
Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/nianticlabs
Follow us on TikTok: tiktok.com/@nianticlabs
Follow us on Facebook: facebook.com/nianticlabs

Peridot on SOCIAL
Follow us on Instagram: instagram.com/playperidot/
Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/playperidot
Follow us on TikTok: tiktok.com/@playperidot
Follow us on Facebook: facebook.com/playperidot
SUBSCRIBE to our YouTube Channel: https://bit.ly/3XCDSgU

#nianticlabs #augmentedreality #arvr #videogames #videogaming #forgamers #peridot #pokemongo#pikminbloom #campfire#playperidot


About Niantic Labs:
We believe we can use technology to lean into the ‘reality’ of augmented reality — encouraging everyone to get outside and connect with the world around us. It’s our responsibility to consider user privacy, responsible use, inclusive development processes, and AR’s potential impact on the world now, not after the fact.

About Peridot:
Discover the fantastical world of Peridot, an upcoming real-world adventure pet game where you care for one-of-a-kind adorable creatures, raise them to adulthood as you explore the world together, and re-diversify their species to protect them from extinction.
